heading: HR02362
0: RESOLUTION INFORMING THE DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT (DBM) THAT THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES HAS RESCINDED ITS APPROVAL OF HOUSE BILL 7436 ENTITLED "AN ACT ABOLISHING THE ROAD BOARD AND PROVIDING FOR THE DISTRIBUTION AND MANAGEMENT OF THE MOTOR VEHICLE USER'S CHARGE COLLECTIONS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8794, ENTITLED "AN ACT IMPOSING A MOTOR VEHICLE USER'S CHARGE ON OWNERS OF ALL TYPES OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES" AND RELEASE THE FUNDS FOR PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION"
